heading.title: CV Anika Szuppa
heading.subtitle: Senior Frontend Developer (React Development & Modern Frontend Architecture)

summary: Passionate frontend developer with 18+ years of experience building high-traffic web applications. Specialized in React, TypeScript and modern frontend architecture. Skilled in responsive, accessible interfaces and collaborative agile workflows.

skills.label: Experience
skills.text: 18+ years in web development, 8+ years in React, TypeScript, Redux and modern frontend technologies.

skills.label: UX & Design
skills.text: Clean UI, responsive and accessible interfaces using TailwindCSS and Material UI.

skills.label: Testing
skills.text: Unit and integration testing with Jest, Vitest, Storybook and React Testing Library.

skills.label: Architecture
skills.text: Component-driven, modular and scalable frontend codebases.

skills.label: Tooling & Build
skills.text: Webpack, Vite, NPM/Yarn workflows; CI/CD; Git; AI-assisted tooling.

skills.label: Approach
skills.text: Responsive design, accessibility (WCAG), SEO and performance optimization.

experience.description: Orgavision is a leading B2B provider of integrated management systems (IMS) for quality management, documentation and knowledge sharing.
tasks: Built scalable React apps with functional components, Hooks, Redux/Context API and TypeScript
Led frontend architecture and state management decisions
Collaborated with backend teams to integrate REST APIs and worked with UX designers to deliver accessible, user-friendly interfaces

experience.description: DaWanda was a popular german, online marketplace for handmade and unique products.
tasks: Developed high-traffic e-commerce components using React, HTML5, CSS3 and JS (ES6+)
Led project planning and team coordination

experience.description: Zeit Online is a leading German news website (~10 million users a month).
tasks: Maintained website scripts, styles, media integrations, SEO optimization and tracking
Contributed to the Zeit Online relaunch, making it one of the first major German news sites to go fully responsive

experience.description: ebay classifieds (now classifieds) is a leading online classifieds platform.
tasks: Developed site features using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS and JS

education.school: Technical University of Applied Sciences Wildau
education.degree: Diploma in Business Informatics (University of Applied Sciences, Germany)

projects.name: Showcase project React/ Typescript
projects.description: This CV was implemented as a showcase project built with React, TypeScript, Storybook, Tailwind and React Testing Library

tasks: Supported local communities on eco-friendly farming projects
